brainly_data.question:
In the decades after world war II, countries around the world used the new technology to create a popular culture that crossed boundaries. what effect did the emergence of an international pop culture have on the world?

a. it triggered an intense rivalry between the two superpowers

b. it seemed to shrink the world. 

c. it magnified the isolationism in europe

d. it increased the differences between cultures
brainly_data.subject: History

all_answers.text: C. is the answer then if i'm wrong don't thank me hope u have a wonderful day :)
